text.0: Telangana government announces Diwali gift for GHMC residents #GHMC #KTR #Diwali https://t.co/Uma7zG9Dwg
text.1: #telanganarains : Government will continue to disburse Rs 10,000 instant relief to the recent Flood Victims in Greater Hyderabad. He appealed people to Register their names in Mee Seva centres and bank account details to avail the benefit, said minister @KTRTRS.
text.2: #Telangana: In other municipalities in the state,  owners are permitted to pay 50 per cent of the property tax . This relief will be applicable to those who pay up-to Rs 10000 annual property tax, said Minister @KTRTRS
text.3: #JUSTIN: Minister @KTRTRS also announced the enhancement of salaries of sanitation workers from Rs 14,500 to Rs 17,000 recognising their services during the corona pandemic.
text.4: #JUSTIN: Domestic property owners in Greater Hyderabad limits have been given 50% relief in the property tax those who pay up to Rs 15,000  in 2020-2021. If the owners in these category already paid full tax,  the 50 percent relief will be adjusted in the next financial year.
text.5: COVID 19: Telangana death toll crosses 1,400 mark, 1,050 fresh COVID cases on Friday #COVID #COVIDdeathsinTelangana #TelanganaHighCourt https://t.co/qP1JILhyEH
